meta.description: Optimize the production of wooden elephants and tigers to maximize profit given material constraints.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: Types of products made in the shop.

params.name: wood_requirement
params.description: Wood required per product in grams.

params.name: plastic_requirement
params.description: Plastic required per product in grams.

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per product sold in dollars.

vars.name: production
vars.description: Number of each product to produce.

objective.name: max_profit
objective.expr: sum(profit[p] * production[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
objective.description: Maximize total profit from selling products.

constraints.name: wood_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(wood_requirement[p] * production[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
constraints.description: Total wood used must not exceed available wood.

constraints.name: plastic_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(plastic_requirement[p] * production[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
constraints.description: Total plastic used must not exceed available plastic.
